TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tavila, title = Tavila, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tavila} }

S.FORM: Tavila Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Tavila a niyaro', 103 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 408 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 402 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun91%, Tayal1%, Truku1%, Paiwan1%, roma4%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Tavila Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Tavila a niyaro', 103 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 408 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 402 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon91%, Tayal1%, Troko1%, Paiwan1%, roma4%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
